title: The Darker Side of Money - Crypto and The Law
description: MarketWatch's financial investigations reporter Lukas I. Alpert discusses the evolving legal landscape surrounding cryptocurrencies with Michele Benedetto Neitz, professor of law at Golden Gate University who is an expert in regulatory and legal issues surrounding blockchain technology.
itunes:author: Barron's Live

Alpert discusses the evolving legal landscape surrounding cryptocurrencies with Michele Benedetto Neitz, professor of law at Golden Gate University who is an expert in regulatory and legal issues surrounding blockchain technology.
